title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
setwd("/Users/baha/Dropbox/dining-philos/")
full = read.table("full_avg.txt",
                  sep=" ",
                  col.names=c("philo", "type", "times"),
                  fill=FALSE,
                  strip.white=TRUE)
full_plot <- ggplot(data=full, aes(x=philo, y=times, fill=type)) +
        geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge(),                 colour="black") +
        labs(x="Philosopher", y="Avg. times eaten", fill="Version")
full_plot
```
